short_description: consultthings is a business consulting company based in bergen, norway.
long_description: crm, erp, business intelligence, product management and configuration, logistics.
generated_description: consultthings is a consultancy firm based in bergen, vestland, norway. the company specializes in various aspects of executive management, contract management, project management, innovation management, creativity management, development management, technology lead, implementation management, purchase management, business plans, business development, business presentations, concept development, product management, process engineering and development, sales and marketing, telecommunications, it, satellite service provider, broadband service provider, and operations. consultthings focuses on quality systems, measurement systems, continuous improvement programs, reporting, planning, specifications and requirements, fixed and mobile switching, satellite gateway, broadband services, and smart home/home automation. the company also has expertise in smart grid and green technologies, including automatic meter reading, monitoring and control, and detailed design capabilities. consultthings offers detailed design and implementation of telecommunications systems, supplier relations, purchasing and contract negotiations, operation and maintenance, lan/wan/vpn/voip/iptv design, and systems operation. they provide detailed design capabilities for wlan/wimax technologies, management networks, process automation, process monitoring/measurement, it systems and strategies, and software solutions. the company's expertise includes hardware prototype development, software development in various programming languages, workflow engines, enterprise bus, business support systems, crm, erp, business intelligence, product management and configuration, logistics, operational support systems, fault management, inventory management, optimization, program profiling, sql/query optimization, flow optimization, and application and database security.
